lead_paragraph: Carolina finally ran out of patience with the injury-prone linebacker Dan Morgan. The Panthers released Morgan, their former first-round pick, after seven seasons. He was dominant when he played but was on the field for only 59 of 112 games. The Panthers also released the veteran Mike Wahle, who started 16 games at left guard last season.
